vote.text: Amendment SA 2651 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2651 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 2647. (consideration: CR S2079-2088; text: CR S2079-2080) To expand the research credit.
